column1: 75 year old male patient. Remote history changes, no comorbidity. Onset with asthenia, dry cough and high fever from 3 days. mp <200; polymerase chain reaction = 15; procalcitonin 8.9. Covid-19 positive pharyngeal swab
computed/computerized tomography at the onset performed at the Marche Nord Hospital in Pesaro.
Coronal reconstruction MPR. Peripheral thickenings with ground glass, prevalent on the upper and mantle lobes, with some small consolidative thickenings, and thickening of the interlobular septa.
Control computed/computerized tomography performed at the Murri di Fermo hospital after 9 days.
Clear improvement of the computed/computerized tomography picture with almost complete resolution of the thickening.
